activity: Guided Historical Walking Tour of Münster
description: Embark on a two-hour walking tour exploring the rich history of Münster, visiting key landmarks and learning about the city's past.

locationInfo.description: A walking tour through Münster's historical sites including the Prinzipalmarkt, St. Paulus Cathedral, and the University of Münster.
safetyTips: Carry an umbrella or a rain jacket, as the weather can change.
Stay together as a group to ensure everyone stays on track.

description: Take a scenic 15 km cycling tour around the Aasee lake, a perfect way to enjoy the cool breeze while staying active with your group.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful route around Aasee with stunning lake views, perfect for a leisurely ride through nature and open spaces.
safetyTips: Make sure your bike is in good working condition.
Bring a water bottle to stay hydrated during the ride.

description: Explore the waters of the Dortmund-Ems Canal with your group in rented kayaks, navigating the gentle waters and enjoying the fresh air.

locationInfo.description: A kayaking adventure on the Dortmund-Ems Canal, offering an ideal mix of relaxation and light exercise as you paddle along the peaceful waters.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Ensure your kayak is secure before getting in the water.
Be cautious around boat traffic and other water users.

activity: Picnic and Nature Walk at Gronau Nature Reserve
description: Pack a picnic and take a group walk through the beautiful Gronau Nature Reserve, where you can relax in nature and enjoy fresh air.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing walk through Gronau Nature Reserve with opportunities to enjoy a picnic in peaceful surroundings surrounded by nature.
safetyTips: Bring a blanket and chairs for a comfortable picnic.
Make sure to bring enough water and food for the group.
Be mindful of local wildlife and do not disturb them.

description: Test your skills and enjoy a group adventure with a rock climbing session at Kletterpark Münster, a great way to challenge yourself and have fun.

locationInfo.description: A thrilling rock climbing park offering various climbing routes for all skill levels. Perfect for groups looking for a bit of adventure in the great outdoors.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable climbing shoes and loose-fitting clothes.
Make sure you're harnessed securely before starting the climb.
Ensure you're familiar with the safety guidelines provided by the park.
